meanings.definition: Relating to the study of the combined effects of aerodynamics and thermodynamics.
meanings.sent1: The aerothermodynamic properties of the spacecraft were crucial for its safe reentry into the atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The engineers conducted aerothermodynamic tests to ensure the efficiency of the new airplane design.
meanings.sent3: The aerothermodynamic dance of the leaves in the wind was both graceful and mesmerizing.
meanings.sent4: Her speech had an aerothermodynamic flow, seamlessly combining facts and emotions.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of aerothermodynamic beauty in the painting of a soaring eagle.

meanings.definition: Involving the interaction of airflow and heat transfer.
meanings.sent1: The aerothermodynamic conditions inside the engine were carefully monitored during the test.
meanings.sent2: The aerothermodynamic properties of the oven ensured even baking of the cake.
meanings.sent3: The aerothermodynamic conversation between the two scientists was filled with excitement and ideas.
meanings.sent4: The aerothermodynamic relationship between the sun and the earth sustains life on our planet.
meanings.sent5: The aerothermodynamic flow of hot air rising was visible in the shimmering heat waves.
